name: Twilight Lagoon (Beta)
description:
Note

This game is currently in beta stage. This means the game is a work in progress you may experience glitches or bugs while playing the game and content is the game may not be final and can be changed.

Welcome to Twilight Lagoon it is a multiplayer game currently being developed as a group project for an university assignment.  

You have been camping with your buddies and your car has broken down. You must complete tasks around the campsite before the timer ends. Tasks include fixing your car,  fishing, clearing  away rubbish, cut logs and put logs onto the campfire, 

[GAMEPLAY  VIDEO HERE]
